question: SIDO is associated with which of the following industries?
explanation: The Small Industries Development Organization (SIDO) is the national SME Development Agency of India. It is a major constituent of the Ministry of Small Scale Industries of the Government of India. It was Set up in 1954, SIDO provides services to small industry throughout the country by implementing a broad program of activities and services like Entrepreneurship Development, Tool Room Services, Testing Centres, Extension Services, R&D Services, etc.
